Blue Beetle 024 (2008) (RacerX-DCP)

[quote]Written by John Rogers; Art and cover by Rafael Albuquerque

Lost in space! The Reach brings its Scarab home ? and Jaime Reyes is about to die far from his, while knowing that his family and allies will be next. His salvation lies deep within the Blue Beetle legacy; it&#039;ll take a hero&#039;s efforts to find it. Don&#039;t miss the shocking ending to this issue! [/quote]


BIG THANKS to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!
